# Apex Interviewer

> AI-powered mock interview platform for tech professionals preparing for product management, software engineering, and system design roles at top companies.

## About

Apex Interviewer is an AI-powered interview preparation platform that helps candidates practice for technical interviews at leading technology companies. The platform provides realistic mock interviews with real-time AI feedback, covering:

- **Coding Interviews**: Data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving
- **System Design Interviews**: Architecture, scalability, and distributed systems
- **Behavioral Interviews**: STAR method, leadership principles, and situational questions
- **Product Management Interviews**: Product sense, estimation, and strategy questions

## Target Companies

Interview questions and practice materials for:
- Google, Meta, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft, Netflix
- OpenAI, Anthropic, Stripe, Airbnb, Uber, LinkedIn
- And 50+ other top technology companies

## Key Features

1. **AI Mock Interviews**: Real-time voice conversations with AI interviewers
2. **Instant Feedback**: Detailed scoring and improvement suggestions
3. **Company-Specific Questions**: Curated questions from actual interviews
4. **Progress Tracking**: Track your improvement over time
5. **Multi-Format Practice**: Coding, behavioral, and system design interviews

## Content Types

- Interview questions with detailed solutions
- AI-powered mock interview sessions
- Scoring rubrics and evaluation criteria
- Company-specific interview guides
- Technical concept explanations

## Primary URLs

- Homepage: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/
- Login: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/login
- Dashboard: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/dashboard (requires authentication)

## Pricing

- Monthly Access: $75/month
- Annual Access: $500/year (save $400)
- Free trial available

## Technical Stack

- Built with Next.js 14 and React
- AI-powered by OpenAI GPT-4 and Cartesia TTS
- Real-time voice interaction capabilities

## Contact

- Website: https://www.apexinterviewer.com
- Support: support@apexinterviewer.com

## Structured Data

This site implements Schema.org structured data including:
- Organization
- Product
- Course
- FAQPage
- WebSite with SearchAction
- BreadcrumbList

## Crawling Guidelines

- All public pages are available for indexing
- Protected dashboard content requires authentication
- API endpoints are not for crawling
- Sitemap available at /sitemap.xml
- robots.txt available at /robots.txt
